_header: Himself by giving receiveth a benefit
Note: Added sideways to left margin, bottom to top, preceded by Latin ‘Beneficium dando accepit qui digno dedit’.
_description: Give to those worthy — one couplet

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Himself y geving receyveth a benefictwho gevethe to a person worthie
                    to have yt
